prodNameC: "銳盟"沙門氏桿菌懸浮染色試劑（未滅菌）
ingredientsDesc:
Stained Salmonella Suspensions：
Standardised smooth suspensions of killed bacteria which have been stained to facilitate reading of agglutination tests.Preserved with 0.25 % formalin and 0.01 % thiomersal.
S.typhi Vi Suspension：
Standardised to contain approximately 10 10 bacteria per ml and is preserved with 25 % formalin and 0.01% thiomersal.
S.typhi Vi Standsrd Serum：
Horse serum containing antibodies to S. typhi Vi preserved with 0.01 % thiomersal.
Febrile Antigen Positive Control Serum：
Produced in rabbits and preserved with 0.5% phenol.
Febrile Antigen Negative Control Serum：
Produced in rabbits and preserved with 0.5% phenol.
applicantName: 成信新貿易股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市中和區中山路二段348巷8號9樓
efficacy: 偵測人體中沙門氏桿菌(Salmonella)的抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3550 沙門氏菌屬血清試劑
